timeline.message: Added test cases to for duplicate url and version of ConceptMap
Added url/conceptMapVersion for ConceptMap to support translate
Updated R5 reverse $translate test case for more coverage
Suggested test that includes case where ConceptVersion is not specified in $translate operation.

timeline.bodyText: The method name might be a bit confusing now that we are supporting multiple ConceptMap versions.  Maybe could change this to something like findUnversionedTermConceptMapByUrl or findTermConceptMapByUrlAndNullVersion.
timeline.author: IanMMarshall

replies.bodyText: Will change to findTermConceptMapByUrlAndNullVersion, not sure this is used by outside out HAPI.
replies.author: frankjtao

replies.bodyText: Good point about breaking backwards compatibility. I suppose we could have kept the old name as well and marked it as deprecated along with a comment recommending the use of the new name.
replies.author: IanMMarshall

timeline.bodyText: Suggestion for a more descriptive method name: getTermConceptMapEntitiesByUrlOrderByVersion.
timeline.author: IanMMarshall

timeline.bodyText: It looks like the else clause above has created a gap in the test coverage for the case where a concept map version is specified but no URL is specified. To be honest, I am not sure if this would even be a valid use case. I would suggest either removing the else clause (e.g. ignore the version if no URL is specified) or adding a JUnit test for this use case.
timeline.author: IanMMarshall

timeline.bodyText: It looks like the else clause above has created a gap in the test coverage for the case where a concept map version is specified but no URL is specified. To be honest, I am not sure if this would even be a valid use case. I would suggest either removing the else clause (e.g. ignore the version if no URL is specified) or adding a JUnit test for this use case.
timeline.author: IanMMarshall

timeline.bodyText: Might need a JUnit test for the case where translate is requested with a URL and no version, but the requested ConceptMap is not versioned in the repository.
timeline.author: IanMMarshall

timeline.bodyText: nitpick - comment should say should return the latest one which in this case is not versioned.
timeline.author: IanMMarshall

timeline.bodyText: nitpick: method ConceptMap spelled as ConcaptMap in the method name.
timeline.author: IanMMarshall

timeline.bodyText: You can remove this class now (I added it for illustration purposes, but the ResourceProviderDstu3ConceptMapTest class provides adequate coverage now).
timeline.author: IanMMarshall

replies.bodyText: This is class is removed and the test cases are merged to ResourceProviderDstu3ConceptMapTest class
replies.author: frankjtao
